description: Spotlighting tales of time travel and the Rogues, these tales from SHOWCASE #4 and 14, THE FLASH #125, 130 and 139 pit The Scarlet Speedster against "The Giants of The Time World," "The Conquerors of Time," along with Mirror Master, Captain Boomerang, The Top, Captain Cold, The Trickster and The Reverse Flash!
name: 100-Page Spectacular

description:
Quarterly British comic reprinting the best stories from the pages of 2000AD. This issue collects all of the PJ Maybe stories up to February 2004.

Cover: Cliff Robinson (Judge Dredd and PJ Maybe)

  • Judge Dredd - Bug (2000AD prog 534) (John Wagner and Alan Grant - Liam Sharp)
  • Judge Dredd - PJ Maybe, Age 13 (2000AD prog 592-594) (John Wagner - Liam Sharp)
  • Judge Dredd - The Further Adventures of PJ Maybe, Age 14 (2000AD prog 599) (John Wagner - Liam Sharp)
  • Judge Dredd - The Confeshuns of PJ Maybe, Age 13 (2000AD prog 632-634) (John Wagner - Liam Sharp)
  • Judge Dredd - Wot I Did During Necropolis (2000AD prog 707-709) (John Wagner - Anthony Williams)
  • Judge Dredd - PJ and the Mock Chock Factory (2000AD prog 820-822) (Garth Ennis - Anthony Williams)
  • Judge Dredd - The All-New Adventures of PJ Maybe (2000AD prog 1204) (John Wagner - Peter Doherty)
  • Judge Dredd - You're a Better Man than I am, Gunga Dinsdale (2000AD prog 1210) (John Wagner - Ben Oliver)
  • Judge Dredd - Bring me the Heart of PJ Maybe (2000AD prog 1211) (John Wagner - Ben Oliver)

Quarterly British comic reprinting the best stories from the pages of 2000AD. This issue collects selected episodes of the first Bill Savage series Invasion, which began in 2000AD prog 1 and finished in prog 51.

The issue is rounded-off with the comedy strip, Bonjo, by Kevin O'Neill.

Cover: Cam Kennedy (Invasion!)

  • Invasion! - The Resistance (2000AD progs 1-5) (Pat Mills/Gerry Finley-Day - Jesus Blasco/Pat Wright/Sarompas)
  • Invasion! - The Doomsday Scenario (2000AD progs 13-15) (Gerry Finley-Day - Mike Dorey/Carlos Pino)
  • Invasion! - The Road to Hell (2000AD progs 19) (Gerry Finley-Day - Mike Dorey)
  • Invasion! - Volgress (2000AD progs 32-33) (Gerry Finley-Day - Mike Dorey)
  • Invasion! - The Prince (2000AD progs 37-44) (Gerry Finley-Day - Mike Dorey/Carlos Pino)
  • Invasion! - The Return of Roas (2000AD progs 45) (Gerry Finley-Day - Carlos Pino)
  • Invasion! - Escape from Liverpool (2000AD progs 47-51) (Gerry Finley-Day - Mike Dorey/Carlos Pino)
  • Bonjo from Beyond the Stars (2000AD progs 41-50) (script/art: Kevin O'Neill)

Quarterly British comic reprinting the best stories from the pages of 2000AD and its spin-off series. Collects the bloody and brutal series Shako. After swallowing a secret Government capsule containing a deadly germ warfare culture, Shako the polar bear is hunted by the CIA over sixteen blood spattered episodes between 2000AD progs 20 and 35.

  • Project Overkill (2000AD progs 119-126) (Kelvin Gosnell - Ian Gibson/Jesus Redondo)
